title: "There is an error with your connection" - cannot connect

embed.description: Provides free image upload and hosting integration for forums. Free picture hosting and photo sharing for websites and blogs.

body:
Hi there,

I cannot connect to the game. Everytime I open the game, after the L logo, it displays the error message window as shown in the image.
Is it just me?

Please help

replies.body:
Hey there,

Did you have a look at the linked support article in that error message?
It is already working days ago. It is fine now

Glad to hear that.

My apologies for such a delayed reply to your thread, I've been rather busy lately with more pressing matters.
Same here, I don't think it was caused by the ranked queues being reset somehow...
